messages.title: David Drew on... housing and the environment
messages.content: The climate is changing and we have to deal with it. The planet is heating up and our national and local politics must recognise that. We can stop the Tory laissez-faire and reckless neglect of our world and create a positive agenda of environmental protection.

messages.title: What has happened to housing and the environment under the Tories?
messages.content: Over the past five years: 1. Tory government has slashed support and investment for renewables. 2. Ambitious targets for new houses have been missed. 3. Private landlords have increased energy prices and rents, making it increasingly unaffordable for many. 4. PMs have consistently resisted Energy and Climate Change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We cannot increase the numbers of affordable houses needed - especially for the young and retirees on low incomes. Private landlords have increased energy prices and rents, making it increasingly unaffordable for many.
The Tories have slashed support and investment for renewables. Labour must create a positive agenda of environmental protection and end the Tory laissez-faire and reckless neglect of our world.

issues.environment: The climate is changing. We can stop the Tory laissez-faire and reckless neglect of our world and create a positive agenda of environmental protection. The Tories have slashed support and investment for renewables.

community.content:
David Drew Labour Candidate for Stroud.
I have always put local people at the centre of everything we do.
With NE Cam through the local plan and Stonehouse Brimscombe and Thrupp in the council strategy.
